title: Social proof: добавить логотипы/отзывы/метрики
Build generation script: AITrader skills → Supabase
description:
## Objective
Write a Python script that runs AITrader skills, detects cross-module conflicts, and inserts a formatted DailyReport into Supabase.

## Must-Haves
1. Run 6 AITrader skills via subprocess (funding-screener, oi-divergence, social-price-divergence, ta-scanner, feargreed, macro-indicators) with --live flag
2. Detect conflicts: compare module biases per symbol, compute conviction scores (0-10), rank by disagreement intensity
3. Format output into DailyReport JSON (v2 schema with headline, crowded_trades, divergences, conviction_scores, module_scorecard, macro_regime) and POST to Supabase REST API

## Non-Goals
- Scheduling/cron setup (manual run for Week 0)
- Email distribution
- Historical analog lookup (Month 1)
- More than top 10 assets

## Verification
- Script runs end-to-end: python3 scripts/generate_daily_disagree.py
- Report appears in Supabase daily_reports table with status=published
- Report renders on context8.markets/reports/daily

## Key Files
- scripts/generate_daily_disagree.py (create, ~150-180 lines)
- AITrader skills at ~/personal/aitrader/.claude/skills/

## Technical Notes
- Skills invoked via: uv run ~/personal/aitrader/.claude/skills/{name}/scripts/{name}.py --live
- Parse JSON from stdout, ignore stderr
- Supabase REST: POST to {SUPABASE_URL}/rest/v1/daily_reports with apikey header
- Store full skill outputs in raw_data JSONB for debugging
- Set report_version: 2 in raw_data to trigger v2 rendering

## Environment
- SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY env vars required
- Python 3.11+, requests library

Bullish = terminal-green, Bearish = terminal-red, Neutral = terminal-cyan.
